description: Do you want a popular drink with a good balance of sweet and tart? This Cherry Fizz recipe is the perfect cocktail you can serve your friends and family.This recipe calls for a high-quality fruit brandy that gives this drink a luscious and tempting note you can never say no to. In addition, the Flying Embers Black Cherry hard seltzer provides a natural taste of muddled cherries and hints of fresh lime.
name: Cherry Fizz
recipeIngredient: 1 can Flying Embers Black Cherry Hard Kombucha

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the cherry brandy and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker filled with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake well for about 15 to 20 seconds, just enough for you to feel the cocktail shaker chilling.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain the mixture into a highball glass filled with two big ice cubes.
